parameter.label: Room
parameter.description: Displays the room which is configured in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: Category
parameter.description: Displays the category which is configured in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: Has night light
parameter.description: shows if this control is connected to a night light.

parameter.label: Snooze duration connected
parameter.description: TRUE if the parameter input Ts is defined in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: Bright inactive connected
parameter.description: TRUE if the parameter input Bi is defined in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: Bright active connected
parameter.description: TRUE if the parameter input Ba is defined in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: Wake alarm sound connected
parameter.description: TRUE if the parameter input S is defined in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: Wake alarm volume connected
parameter.description: TRUE if the parameter input Sv is defined in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: Wake alarm sloping connected
parameter.description: TRUE if the parameter input Sr is defined in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: Wake alarm sounds
parameter.description: Array of all available sounds.

parameter.label: Unreachable
parameter.description: Set to "true" when the device is unreachable. This means that the associated control no longer exists in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: Is enabled
parameter.description: shows if the AlarmClock is enabled.

parameter.label: Is alarm active
parameter.description: True if an entry is ringing.

parameter.label: Confirmation needed
parameter.description: True if the User needs to confirm the entry.

parameter.label: Current entry
parameter.description: The entryID of the current entry.

parameter.label: Next entry
parameter.description: The entryID of the next entry.

parameter.label: Next entry mode
parameter.description: Represents operating modes 3 - 9 from our structure file.

parameter.label: Ringing time
parameter.description: Countdown in seconds how long the alarmClock will be ringing until itâ€™s going to snooze again.

parameter.label: Ring duration
parameter.description: The duration the AlarmClock is ringing.

parameter.label: Prepare duration
parameter.description: The preparation time in seconds.

parameter.label: Snooze time
parameter.description: Seconds until snoozing ends.

parameter.label: Snooze duration
parameter.description: Duration of snoozing.

parameter.label: Next entry time
parameter.description: Date of next entry in seconds since 1.1.2009.

parameter.label: Device state
parameter.description: The current state of the Nightlight.

parameter.label: Entry list
parameter.description: Object with all the entries.

parameter.label: New entry
parameter.description: set new entry to entry list. String:{entryID}/{name}/{alarmTime}/{isActive}/{modes|daily}.

parameter.label: Device settings
parameter.description: JSON string showing actual device settings

parameter.label: Wake alarm sound settings
parameter.description: Json String showing actual wake alarm sound settings.

parameter.label: Beep used
parameter.description: Shows if the keyclick of the night light is activ. Set this value to true to enable keyclick, set to false to disable keyclick.

parameter.label: Bright inactive
parameter.description: Shows the display brightness during inactivity. Set this variable to the brightness you want during inactivity.

parameter.label: Bright active
parameter.description: Shows the display brightness during activity. Set this variable to the brightness you want during activity.

parameter.label: Delete entry
parameter.description: Delete this entry from entry list.

parameter.label: Snooze
parameter.description: Snoozes the current active entry.

parameter.label: Dismiss
parameter.description: Dismisses the current active entry.
